instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00165-A no green light boot up have fan spin after smc replace
threads.message:
hi 
first of all i have green light and orange as well but macbook dont boot up then i pull out the battery its also same but when i plug out charger and plug in again it turn on then i turned off it never turn on with power button. when try to open up with button orange light turn green and orange again no boot up.
 i try to change smc after smc changing now i have no light on macsafe and ppbus_g3h 8.17 volt but macbook boot up read ssd also but no light and when i try to close it with button it reset but no close 

ppbus_g3h       8,17
pp3v42_g3h     3,42

please help

threads.title: 820-00165-A no green light boot up have fan spin after smc replace
threads.message:
Did you take the SMC form donor board, same model?
If yes, try first to reflow SMC; gently tap it, to see it "dancing" a bit.
If no result, reball original SMC and test the board.

threads.title: 820-00165-A no green light boot up have fan spin after smc replace
threads.message: Yes MUST come from 00165 donor board. Sounds like another bad SMC to me. What do you get for diode mode on both of the SMBUS lines at R5380/1?

threads.title: 820-00165-A no green light boot up have fan spin after smc replace
threads.message: i took smc from aliexpress :( i think it is not programmed isnt it ?

threads.title: 820-00165-A no green light boot up have fan spin after smc replace
820-00165-A no green light boot up have fan spin after smc replace
threads.message: Yeah that chip is trash. Order a donor from aliexpress, pull the chip, reball it, and install it. Best to order 3 donors to make sure you get a good one

threads.title: 820-00165-A no green light boot up have fan spin after smc replace
threads.message:
I already posted few times where to get MacBook scrap boards from China.
If you contact him through Skype he will make discount, better price than on eBay, or AliExpress.
Use search function on the forum...
